minidplyr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Select variables in data.frame

Source: R/test.R
select.Rd

this function is the same as select function from dplyr

select(df, variables)

Arguments

df

a data frame
variables

either a vecotr of variable names or indexs

Value

a date frame with selected variables

Details

i just make a small test for this

Examples

select(iris,"Species")
